argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( topGen ` ran (,) ) = ( topGen ` ran (,) ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_abscn | |- abs e. ( ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) Cn ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_ssid | |- CC C_ CC |
| 5 |  | #P_ax-resscn | |- RR C_ CC |
| 6 | 1 | #P_cnfldtopon | |- ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) e. ( TopOn ` CC ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_toponunii | |- CC = U. ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_restid | |- ( ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) e. ( TopOn ` CC ) -> ( ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |`t CC ) = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) ) |
| 9 | 6, 8 | #P_ax-mp | |- ( ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |`t CC ) = ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_eqcomi | |- ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) = ( ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |`t CC ) |
| 11 | 1 | #P_tgioo2 | |- ( topGen ` ran (,) ) = ( ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) |`t RR ) |
| 12 | 1, 10, 11 | #P_cncfcn | |- ( ( CC C_ CC /\ RR C_ CC ) -> ( CC -cn-> RR ) = ( ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) Cn ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) ) |
| 13 | 4, 5, 12 | #P_mp2an | |- ( CC -cn-> RR ) = ( ( TopOpen ` CCfld ) Cn ( topGen ` ran (,) ) ) |
| 14 | 3, 13 | #P_eleqtrri | |- abs e. ( CC -cn-> RR ) |
\
 Absolute value is continuous.  Alternate proof of ~ abscncf . (Contributed by NM, 6-Jun-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Sep-2015.)  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
